item.title: I am a 65-year old single woman with 25 credit cards. How do I cancel them without hurting my credit score?
item.description: “I pay them off each month if I use them and don’t run a balance.”

item.title: Kanye West’s former Malibu beach house is now caught in a bitter battle between developers
item.description: A failed deal between two developers for the purchase of a Malibu beach house that was owned by Kanye West has turned into a nasty spat.

item.title: In $18 billion deal to buy JDE Peet’s, Keurig Dr Pepper unwinds a 2018 marriage between soda and coffee
item.description: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. announced an $18 billion deal to acquire the Dutch coffee company JDE Peet’s NV, The Wall Street Journal reported late Sunday.

item.title: U.S. stock futures slip following Friday’s Fed-fueled rally
item.description: U.S. stock-market futures declined Sunday, after stocks rallied Friday on fresh hopes of a September rate cut by the Fed.

item.title: ‘I can only rely on me’: How do I protect myself from my parents’ nursing-home bills?
item.description: “I do not expect or need anything from my parents.”
